metadata.title: CVE-2024-2961 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The iconv plugin ISO-2022-CN-EXT, when converting from UCS4, might triggera OOB write.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-2961` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glibc-source - 2.35-0ubuntu3.7
libc-bin - 2.35-0ubuntu3.7
libc6 - 2.35-0ubuntu3.7
libc6-amd64 - 2.35-0ubuntu3.7
libc6-i386 - 2.35-0ubuntu3.7
libc6-prof - 2.35-0ubuntu3.7
libc6-s390 - 2.35-0ubuntu3.7
libc6-x32 - 2.35-0ubuntu3.7
locales - 2.35-0ubuntu3.7
locales-all - 2.35-0ubuntu3.7
nscd - 2.35-0ubuntu3.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glibc package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.35-0ubuntu3.7').
